properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA out 10 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm; Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 12 at 2:12PM PST until January 15 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous
seas around 18 ft at 13 seconds. This in combination with steep
wind waves will make for chaotic seas. Seas will subside but
remain high with small craft advisory conditions on Monday and
Tuesday.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, until 10 PM PST Monday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 PM Monday to 4 AM PST
Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or damage
vessels. Bar crossing will become especially treacherous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for very steep seas and consider remaining in port
until conditions improve.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST MONDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM MONDAY TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY
